verbs.description: [ARG0: rouhani] [V: says] [ARG1: u s isolated against iran reshuffles economic team] iranian president hassan rouhani said on saturday that the united states was isolated among its traditional allies in its confrontation with iran and that even europe was siding with tehran against the reimposition of u s sanctions europe dubai general assembly u s washington iranian president hassan rouhani rouhani united states reuters new york farhad dejpasand tehran iran america european union russia
